lead_paragraph: The unidentified man’s body, whose face was wrapped in duct tape and whose arms were tied behind his back, was found by a Kingsborough Community College student.

headline.print_headline: Man’s Body, Feet Encased in Concrete, Comes Ashore
headline.main: Man’s Body, Feet Encased in Concrete, Washes Ashore in Brooklyn

snippet: The unidentified man’s body, whose face was wrapped in duct tape and whose arms were tied behind his back, was found by a Kingsborough Community College student.
abstract: Body of man, face wrapped in duct tape and feet encased in concrete, washes ashore in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn; authorities are investigating.
